common: May contain heavy metal contaminants such as mercury & cadmium
Do not take in high doses or for long periods of time

description.common: shark cartilage increases effects of acarbose by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. Theoretical interaction.

interferon alfa 2b, shark cartilage.
Either increases effects of the other by pharmacodynamic synergism. Minor/Significance Unknown. Enhanced anti angiogenesis (theoretical interaction).
juice (fruit) decreases levels of shark cartilage by inhibition of GI absorption. Applies only to oral form of both agents. Minor/Significance Unknown.

adverse effects.name: Pain or swelling in the upper right part of the abdomen
Yellowing of skin or white parts of eyes
